locales.name: german abstract product name
locales.url: abstract product url in german frontend

media.thumbnail_url: full url to locale thumbnail of the media
media.type: type of the media (e.g. picture, video, pdf, ...)
media.sequence: 1...n (the first one should be taken as default product picture

attributes.not yet defined: any other media specific german localized attributes
any other german localized attributes! Could think about inheriting these to concrete product too

locales.name: english abstract product name
locales.url: abstract product url in english frontend

media.thumbnail_url: full url to locale thumbnail of the media
media.type: type of the media (e.g. picture, video, pdf, ...)
media.sequence: 1...n (the first one should be taken as default product picture

attributes.not yet defined: any other media specific english localized attributes
any other english localized attributes the abstract product should have

media.url: full url to locale independent media !If there is a locale media definition, this will be used instead of the general one! (e.g. http://petsdeli.de/images/general_abstract_product_image.jpg
media.thumbnail_url: full url to locale independent thumbnail of the media
media.type: type of the media (e.g. picture, video, pdf, ...)
media.sequence: 1...n (the first one should be taken as default product picture

attributes.any_other_attribute_for_abstract_product: Any other attribute that you want to have in the abstract product definition

concrete_products.name: locale independent name of the concrete product

media.thumbnail_url: full url to locale thumbnail of the media
media.type: type of the media (e.g. picture, video, pdf, ...)
media.sequence: 1...n (the first one should be taken as default product picture

attributes.not yet defined: any other german localized attributes! Could think about inheriting these to concrete product too

attributes.any_other_locale_specific_attribute_for_: any other german localized attributes the concrete product should have

media.thumbnail_url: full url to locale thumbnail of the media
media.type: type of the media (e.g. picture, video, pdf, ...)
media.sequence: 1...n (the first one should be taken as default product picture

attributes.not yet defined: any other media specific english localized attributes

attributes.any_other_locale_specific_attribute_for_: any other english localized attributes the concrete product should have

concrete_products.price: 12000 => product price including VAT in cent

attributes.any_other_general_attribute_for_concrete: any other attribute that should be available in the concrete product

bundle_products.sku: sku of a concrete product that is assigned to that bundle
bundle_products.quantity: how many times should the concrete product be included in that bundle (>=1)

dynamic_product_settings.total_quantity: > 0 => total quantity of products the dynamic product consists of (e.g. 10 for the Starterpackage 10)

products.sku: sku of concrete product that is allowed to be part of the dynamic product !this sku MUST exist before it can be used!
products.quantity: how often should that product be in the package (>= 0)
